days.exampleEN: "The sun to rule by day Alleluia: His mercy endures forever"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲫⲣⲏ ⲉ̀ⲟⲫⲉⲣϣⲓϣⲓ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲡⲓⲉ̀ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁ̅ⲗ̅: ϫⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁⲓ ϣⲟⲡ ϣⲁ ⲉ̀ⲛⲉϩ"

days.exampleEN: "It was truly, good caring, of the Saint, Mary Magdalene"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲕⲁⲗⲱⲥ ϧⲉⲛ ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲑⲙⲏⲓ: ⲁⲥϣⲱⲡⲓ ϧⲉⲛ ⲟⲩϥⲓⲣⲱⲟⲩϣ: ̀ⲛϫⲉ ⲑⲏⲉ̅ⲑ̅ⲩ̅ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ: ϯⲙⲁⲅⲇⲁⲗⲓⲛⲏ"

days.exampleEN: "Blessed are you among women, blessed is the fruit of your womb"
days.source: Vespers Praises, The Watos Lobsh/Second Shiraat

days.exampleEN: "Therefore the soldiers did these things"
"Bless the Lord, all you birds of the sky"
"The love of God the Father, and the grace of the only-begotten Son"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲏ ̀ⲁⲅⲁⲡⲏ ⲧⲟⲩ Ⲑⲉⲟⲩ Ⲡⲁⲧⲣⲟⲥ: ⲕⲉ ⲏ̀ ⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲧⲟⲩ ⲙⲟⲛⲟⲅⲉⲛⲟⲩⲥ"
days.source: Liturgy of the Word, Alternate Response to the Pauline Epistle

days.exampleEN: "The moon and stars to rule by night Alleluia"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲡⲓⲓⲟϩ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲛⲓⲥⲓⲟⲩ ⲉⲩⲉⲝⲟⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲡⲓ̀ⲉϫⲱⲣϩ ⲁ̅ⲗ̅"

days.exampleEN: "Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal"
"O name full of glory, O name full of blessings"
"Remember, O Lord, the others"
days.source: Gregorian Liturgy of the Faithful, Prayer for the Departed

days.exampleEN: "May God have compassion upon us"
"Come all you believers"
days.source: Midnight Praises, The Hymn for the Resurrection

days.exampleEN: "Blessed are You in the holy temple of Your glory"
"Bless the crown of the year with Your goodness…"
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, Litany of the Seeds and Herbs

days.exampleEN: "O Holy City, of the Great King"
"O King of Peace"
days.source: Liturgy of St. Basil, The Short Blessing

days.exampleEN: "But those things which are good and profitable do provide for us"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲛⲏ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲑⲛⲁⲛⲉⲩ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲛⲏⲉ̀ⲧⲉⲣⲛⲟϥⲣⲓ ⲥⲁϩⲛⲓ ⲙ̀ⲙⲱⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲛ"

days.exampleEN: "Glory to the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit"
days.source: Midnight Praises, Introduction to the Midnight Praises

days.exampleEN: "I am small among my brothers"
"Worthy, worthy, worthy"
"Blessed be the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit"
days.exampleCT: "Ϫⲉ ϥ̀ⲥ̀ⲙⲁⲣⲱⲟⲩⲧ ⲛ̀ϫⲉ Ⲫⲓⲱⲧ ⲛⲉⲙ Ⲡϣⲏⲣⲓ ⲛⲉⲙ Ⲡⲓⲡ̀ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲉⲑⲟⲩⲁⲃ"
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, Gospel Response

days.exampleEN: "Let us praise the Lord of hosts"
days.source: Midnight Praises, Introduction to the Midnight Praises

days.exampleEN: "Praise the Lord from the earth"
"Hail to the whole choir of the martyrs"
"for You have given us all things"
days.source: Three Great Litanies, Litany of Peace

days.exampleEN: "Let us give thanks"
"Again, let us give thanks to God"
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, Introduction to the Fraction

days.exampleEN: "The peace of my Father I leave with you"
days.source: Midnight Praises, Conclusion of the Adam Theotokia

days.exampleEN: "Lord have mercy"
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, The Seven Short Litanies

days.exampleEN: "He became man like us except only for sin"
"Through the intercessions, of the Theotokos Saint Mary"
days.source: Liturgy of the Word, Hymn of the Intercessions

days.exampleEN: "You, O my Master have turned for me the punishment into salvation"
days.source: Gregorian Liturgy of the Word, Holy Holy Holy (ⲁⲅⲓⲟⲥ, ⲁⲅⲓⲟⲥ, ⲁⲅⲓⲟⲥ)

days.exampleEN: "Your Sanctuary, O Lord"
"Pray for our fathers and our bretheren"
"I believe that this is true."
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, The Confession

days.exampleEN: "Our Lord, God, Savior, and King of us all"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲡⲉⲛϭⲟⲓⲥ ⲟⲩⲟϩ Ⲡⲉⲛⲛⲟⲩϯ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲡⲉⲛⲥⲱⲧⲏⲣ ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲡⲉⲛⲟⲩⲣⲟ ⲧⲏⲣⲉⲛ"
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, Prayer of Reconciliation

days.exampleEN: "Seek your servant"
days.source: Midnight Praises, Introduction to the Midnight Praises

days.exampleEN: "Through the intercessions"
days.source: Liturgy of the Word, Hymn of the Intercessions

days.exampleEN: "O you cold and fire and heat"
days.source: Midnight Praises, Greek Watos Psali for the Three Saintly Children

days.exampleEN: "And we cry out fervently: with great splendor: saying, 'Hail to you, O Virgin: the Lord is with you.'"
days.exampleCT: "Ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉⲛⲱϣ ⲉ̀ⲃⲟⲗ ⲣⲏⲧⲱⲥ: ϧⲉⲛ ⲟⲩⲛⲓϣϯ ⲙ̀ⲙⲉⲧⲥⲁⲓⲥ: ϫⲉ ⲭⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲱ̀ ϯⲡⲁⲣⲑⲉⲛⲟⲥ: ⲟⲩⲟϩ Ⲡⲟ̅ⲥ̅ ϣⲟⲡ ⲛⲉⲙⲉ."

days.definition: [ⲡⲓ] - the, [ϧⲱⲕ] - girdle, breast plate, military arms
days.exampleEN: "The spiritual raiment, envelops Michael, and the girdle of jewels, Michael has donned."
days.exampleCT: "Ϯⲥ̀ⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲙ̀ⲡ̀ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁⲧⲓⲕⲟⲛ: ⲁⲩϯϩⲓⲱⲧϥ ⲙ̀Ⲙⲓⲭⲁⲏⲗ: ⲟⲩⲟϩ ⲡⲓϧⲱⲕ ⲙ̀ⲙⲁⲣⲅⲁⲣⲓⲧⲏⲥ: ⲁⲩⲙⲏⲣ ⲙ̀Ⲙⲓⲭⲁⲏⲗ ⲙ̀ⲙⲟϥ."

days.exampleEN: "Every generation that was from, Adam to this day, find Raphael, a fortress for mankind."
days.exampleCT: "Ⲅⲉⲛⲉⲁ̀ ⲛⲓⲃⲉⲛ ⲉ̀ⲧⲁⲩϣⲱⲡⲓ: ⲓⲥϫⲉⲛ Ⲁ̀ⲇⲁⲙ ϣⲁ ⲉ̀ϧⲟⲩⲛ ⲙ̀ⲫⲟⲟⲩ: ⲥⲉϫⲓⲙⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̀Ⲣⲁⲫⲁⲏⲗ: ⲉϥⲟⲓ ⲛ̀ⲥⲟⲃⲧ ⲉ̀ϯⲙⲉⲧⲣⲱⲙⲓ."

days.exampleEN: "the forty-nine martyrs, the elders of Shiheet
days.source: Liturgy of the Faithful, Commemoration of the Saints

days.exampleEN: "Beasts and all cattle Alleluia. Creeping things and flying birds."
days.exampleCT: "Ⲛⲓⲑⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲛⲓⲧⲉⲃⲛⲱⲟⲩⲓ̀ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲁⲗⲗⲏⲗⲟⲩⲓⲁ. Ⲛⲓϭⲁⲧϥⲓ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲛⲓϩⲁⲗⲁϯ ⲉⲧⲟⲓ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉⲛϩ."

days.definition: to hear, to listen, to obey
days.exampleEN: "Hear O daughter, and see, and incline your ear. Forget your own people also, and your father´s house."
days.exampleCT: "Ⲥⲱⲧⲉⲙ ⲧⲁϣⲉⲣⲓ ⲁ̀ⲛⲁⲩ ⲣⲉⲕ ⲡⲉⲙⲁϣϫ: ⲁ̀ⲣⲓⲡ̀ⲱⲃϣ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲡ̀ⲏⲓ ⲧⲏⲣϥ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲓⲱⲧ."
days.source: Liturgy of the Word, Psalm for 2nd Sunday of Kiahk

days.exampleEN: "The crown of our pride, the head of our salvation, the confirmation of our purity, is the Virgin Mary."
days.exampleCT: "Ⲡⲓⲭ̀ⲗⲟⲙ ⲛ̀ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲛϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ: ⲧ̀ⲁ̀ⲡⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲛⲥⲱϯ: ⲡ̀ⲧⲁϫⲣⲟ ⲙ̀ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲟⲩⲃⲟ: ⲡⲉ Ⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ Ϯⲡⲁⲣⲑⲉⲛⲟⲥ."

days.exampleEN: "Bless the Lord O you whales and all that moves in the waters, praise Him and exalt Him above all forever."
days.exampleCT: "Ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉ̀Ⲡ̀ϭⲟⲓⲥ ⲛⲓⲕⲏⲧⲟⲥ ⲛⲉⲙ ⲉⲛⲭⲁⲓ ⲛⲓⲃⲉⲛ ⲉⲧⲕⲓⲙ ϧⲉⲛ ⲛⲓⲙⲱⲟⲩ: ϩⲱⲥ ⲉ̀ⲣⲟϥ ⲁ̀ⲣⲓϩⲟⲩⲟ̀ ϭⲁⲥϥ ϣⲁ ⲛⲓⲉ̀ⲛⲉϩ."

days.exampleEN: "The bush which Moses, has seen in the wilderness, and the fire that was in it, did not burn its branches."
days.exampleCT: "Ⲡⲓⲃⲁⲧⲟⲥ ⲉ̀ⲧⲁ Ⲙⲱⲩ̀ⲥⲏⲥ: ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉ̀ⲣⲟϥ ⲉ̀ⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓ ⲡ̀ϣⲁϥⲉ: ⲉ̀ⲣⲉ ⲡⲓⲭ̀ⲣⲱⲙ ⲙⲟϩ ⲛ̀ϧⲏⲧϥ: ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲙ̀ⲡⲟⲩⲣⲱⲕϩ ⲛ̀ϫⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲕ̀ⲗⲁⲇⲟⲥ."
